member.name: T:AutoWOGeneration.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:AutoWOGeneration.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:AutoWOGeneration.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:AutoWOGeneration.DataModel.ItemWrapperBase
member.summary: This is the "Data" level of Automated WO Generation. The purpose of this class is to take the base object, and extend it with additional properties that are either calculated, loaded from another object, or created in some other way.

member.name: E:AutoWOGeneration.DataModel.ItemWrapperBase.PropertyChanged
member.summary: Raised when any potentially data-bound property is changed. This is important because it is what notifies controls and grids that are bound to the objects to update their values.

member.name: F:AutoWOGeneration.DataModel.ItemWrapperBase._context
member.summary: IMPORTANT - This saves the application context from when the object is created. This is used to make sure that PropertyChanged events are raised on the correct (Main) thread, so that the controls can update correctly.

member.name: M:AutoWOGeneration.DataModel.ItemWrapperBase.OnPropertyChangedContext(System.Object)
member.summary: Handler for OnPropertyChanged post back to main thread.

member.name: P:AutoWOGeneration.DataModel.ItemWrapperBase.DisplayRev
member.summary: The part number revision that will be displayed in the grid based on long part company option

member.name: P:AutoWOGeneration.DataModel.ItemWrappers.GridErrorVisibility
member.summary: Returns true if there was a loading error. It is used to determine if the Grid Error UI is shown.

member.name: P:AutoWOGeneration.DataModel.ItemWrappers.Status
member.summary: Returns the status of the GSSEO collection load.

member.name: P:AutoWOGeneration.DataModel.ItemWrappers.Parameters
member.summary: These are the parameters provided to the GSSEO collection Load function. In most cases, it's bounding, like "starting and ending part", for example.

member.name: M:AutoWOGeneration.DataModel.ItemWrappers.LoadObjectCollectionThreadSafe(GSSEO.IGSSEOCollection@,System.Int32,System.Object[])
member.summary: Loads a collection object. Uses a lock to ensure that GSSEO is only loading a single thing at a time. It likes to break if you try to multi-thread it.

member.name: T:AutoWOGeneration.DataModel.Collections.gssDictionary`2
member.summary: This dictionary class adds ItemAdded, ItemRemoved, and CollectionModified events for whenever a pair is added or removed from the dictionary.
member.remarks: Events are not triggered when values are modified, only add/remove.

member.name: T:AutoWOGeneration.DataModel.Collections.gssConcurrentDictionary`2
member.summary: This concurrent dictionary class adds ItemAdded, ItemRemoved, and CollectionModified events for whenever a pair is added or removed from the dictionary.
member.remarks: Events are not triggered when values are modified, only add/remove

member.name: T:AutoWOGeneration.DataModel.Collections.gssList`1
member.summary: This list class adds ItemAdded, ItemRemoved, and CollectionModified events for whenever an item is added or removed from the list.
member.remarks: Events are not triggered when values are modified, only add/remove

member.name: T:AutoWOGeneration.Registry.GSSRegistry
member.summary: Reads and Saves Registry Values from the Menu.
member.remarks: Written by Stephanie Castro. Requires F_IPM in your project.

member.name: M:AutoWOGeneration.Registry.GSSRegistry.AddRegVal(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int64,System.Int64,System.Boolean,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Int64,System.Double,System.DateTime,System.DateTime)
member.remarks: Registry ID's are at the coders distrection. Key is user, company, program, regid, seq.

member.name: M:AutoWOGeneration.Registry.GSSRegistry.GetRegVal(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int64,System.Int64,AutoWOGeneration.Registry.GSSRegistry.RegistryValueType,System.Object)
member.returns: Uses default value if none found or returns value based on type.
